title: All Ball - George Mason HC Kim English on Baltimore Hoops, Mizzou Success, NBA Experience
itunes:title: All Ball - George Mason HC Kim English on Baltimore Hoops, Mizzou Success, NBA Experience
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by George Mason Head Basketball Coach Kim English, who discusses his Baltimore hoops background, his grandfather's influence, transferring to four different high schools, his battle to overcome a childhood stutter, playing under Mike Anderson and Frank Haith, trying to stick it in the NBA, and his overseas experience. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
